description: square vase with round tapered neck and small mouth; sides divided into four squares by a white line, squares in blue and pink; dark edges define side and top
markings: single Japanese character impressed in clay at underside, center; rectangular sticker with \'46\', in black ink; \'TATSUZO/SHIMAOKA/Fran/Mashiko\', in black ink, at underside
medium: Mashiko ware; glazed stoneware with inlaid slip decor
title: Slip-inlaid rope-pattern square bottle
